items.title: Remembering the sports stars we lost in 2025
items.description: A host of figures from the world of sport died in 2025 - BBC Sport remembers some of those sporting names.

items.title: UK names Christian Turner as ambassador to US, replacing Peter Mandelson
items.description: Turner has spent a nearly 30-year career working across Whitehall and the Foreign Office.

items.title: Democrats release latest batch of Epstein photos as justice department deadline looms
items.description: The materials include photos of women's passports, and Lolita quotes written across a woman's body.

items.title: HR exec in viral Coldplay clip speaks of abuse, threats and trying to find a new job
items.description: The former tech executive says she was bombarded with abusive and threatening messages after being filmed with her boss on the 'kiss-cam'.

items.title: Kennedy Center to be renamed Trump-Kennedy Center, White House says
items.description: The board of the performing arts centre, which was appointed by Trump, voted to rename it to honour him, the White House press secretary says.
